C

codes.ollieg.magicmotd - package codes.ollieg.magicmotd
The main package for the MagicMOTD plugin.
Plugin Description: A BungeeCord proxy plugin that replaces the MOTD with dynamic messages!
codes.ollieg.magicmotd.commands - package codes.ollieg.magicmotd.commands
The commands associated with the MagicMOTD plugin.
codes.ollieg.magicmotd.handlers - package codes.ollieg.magicmotd.handlers
The event listeners associated with the MagicMOTD plugin.
